subject: Decisions and Verdicts
Baseball
Perjury
Steroids
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: After prosecutors used information Judge Reggie Walton had ruled inadmissible, he called a mistrial in the perjury trial of the former pitcher Roger Clemens.
snippet: After prosecutors used information Judge Reggie Walton had ruled inadmissible, he called a mistrial in the perjury trial of the former pitcher Roger Clemens.
